Title: Report on the Subway Station Accident
Text:
[Incident Report
Project Number: ■■■■
Investigator: ■■■
Person in Charge: ■■■, ■■■
Location: ■■■ Intercity Ground Rail Station
Date: ■■■ Year ■■ Month ■■■ Day
Incident Summary: The Wuthering Waves subconcentration, anomalies, and information in the area were detected by the ■■■ device to be in line with the best experimental site for the "pooled cause", so the ■■■ team started work on the same day. The researcher ■■■ used the power of the "Collective Factor" and successfully connected with ■■, obtaining information about the history of this place and ways to calm ■■ down. However, the connection was too strong for ■■ to sever on her own, so the other team members forcibly awakened ■■ while calming ■■. After ■■■ completed the report recording, he experienced hallucinations, blurred consciousness, and loss of consciousness, and lost his vital signs an hour later.
The ■■■ Intercity Ground Rail Station was assessed to be extremely dangerous and was sealed off and cleaned up with immediate effect, with all survivors of the ■■■ Squad under special observation.
